# Repository Information for GitHub

Copy this information to your GitHub repository settings:

## About Section

**Description:**
```
Multi-chain blockchain explorer for Cosmos ecosystem with EVM support. Features IBC transfers, PRC20 tokens, validator monitoring, and governance tools.
```

## How to Add This Information

### 1. Repository Description & Website

1. Go to: https://github.com/winsnip-official/winscan.org
2. Click the ⚙️ (gear icon) next to "About" on the right sidebar
3. Fill in:
   - **Description**: Multi-chain blockchain explorer for Cosmos ecosystem with EVM support. Features IBC transfers, PRC20 tokens, validator monitoring, and governance tools.
   - **Website**: https://winsnip.xyz
4. Check these boxes:
   - ✅ Releases
   - ✅ Packages
   - ✅ Deployments
5. Click "Save changes"

### 2. Repository Topics

1. In the same "About" settings dialog
2. Add topics one by one (press Enter after each):
   - blockchain
   - cosmos
   - explorer
   - nextjs
   - typescript
   - ibc
   - cosmos-sdk
   - blockchain-explorer
   - cryptocurrency
   - web3
   - evm
   - cosmwasm
   - validators
   - staking
   - governance
   - defi
   - multi-chain
   - prc20
   - bridge
   - winscan

### 3. Social Preview Image (Optional)

1. Go to: Settings → General → Social preview
2. Upload an image (1280x640px recommended)
3. This will show when sharing on social media

---

## Repository Settings Checklist

### General Settings
- ✅ Description added
- ✅ Website added
- ✅ Topics added
- ✅ Issues enabled
- ✅ Discussions enabled (optional)
- ✅ Wiki disabled (use docs/ folder instead)
- ✅ Projects enabled

### Features to Enable
- ✅ Wikis: Disabled (we use docs in repo)
- ✅ Issues: Enabled
- ✅ Sponsorships: Enabled (optional)
- ✅ Preserve this repository: Enabled
- ✅ Discussions: Enabled (for community)

### Branch Settings
- ✅ Default branch: `dev`
- ✅ Branch protection rules: See BRANCH_PROTECTION.md

### Security Settings
- ✅ Dependabot alerts: Enabled
- ✅ Dependabot security updates: Enabled
- ✅ Secret scanning: Enabled
- ✅ Code scanning (CodeQL): Enabled

### Collaborators & Teams
- Add team members as needed
- Set appropriate permissions
